properties.name: scanPlaceholders
properties.label: Scan Placeholders
properties.description: Whether to scan this artifact for placeholders when it is imported

properties.name: delimiters
properties.label: Delimiters
properties.description: The delimiters used indicate placeholders, defaults to '{{ }}'. This is a 5 character string with a space in the middle, the first two are the leading delimiter, the last two are the closing delimiter

properties.name: textFileNamesRegex
properties.label: Text File Names Regex
properties.description: Regular expression that matches file names of text files
properties.default: .+\.(cfg | conf | config | ini | properties | props | txt | asp | aspx | htm | html | jsf | jsp | xht | xhtml | sql | xml | xsd | xsl | xslt)

properties.name: excludeFileNamesRegex
properties.label: Exclude File Names Regex
properties.description: Regular expression that matches file names that must be excluded from scanning

properties.name: checksum
properties.label: Checksum
properties.description: The checksum used to detect differences on the artifact. If not provided, it will be calculated by XL Deploy.

properties.name: fileEncodings
properties.label: File Encodings
properties.description: A map that maps regular expressions matching the full path of file(s) in the artifact to character set encodings

properties.name: fileUri
properties.label: File Uri
properties.description: The URI pointing to the (remote) location of the file this artifact represents

properties.name: hostTemplate
properties.label: Host Template
properties.description: Host template on which provisioning actions will be executed.
